scripts.test: npm run db-cleanup && sls dynamodb start & sleep 5 && mocha --require node_modules/ts-node/register/index.js test/*.spec.ts && npm run db-cleanup
scripts.db-cleanup: kill `ps -ax | grep Dynamo | grep -v grep | awk '{print $1}'` >/dev/null 2>&1 &
scripts.create: sls alexa auth && sls alexa create --name BaerData --locale de-DE --type custom
scripts.deploy: npm run test && sls deploy && sls alexa build && sls alexa update
